actions.text: Amendment SA 1632 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1632 proposed by Senator Specter for Senator Sessions to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11323) To require the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to prepare a comprehensive plan to address blood safety and injection safety in Africa under the Global AIDS Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1632 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1632 proposed by Senator Specter for Senator Sessions to Amendment SA 1542.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To require the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to prepare a comprehensive plan to address blood safety and injection safety in Africa under the Global AIDS Program.
